label: uncl6029
comment: Code identifying the type of a geographical position.

values.label: Start position
values.comment: A geographical position identifying the start.

values.label: End position
values.comment: A geographical position identifying the end.

values.label: Surface area border point
values.comment: Point on the border of a surface area.

values.label: Transport means reporting location
values.comment: The geographical location from which a means of transport transmits a report.
